title: Moment police evacuate family after tree strikes home
description: Police body camera footage from Tampa shows the moment officers help the family to safety through driving rain.
excerpt: Police body camera footage from Tampa shows the moment officers help the family to safety through driving rain.

html:
Police body camera footage has captured the moment police helped evacuate a family from their home after it was damaged after Hurricane Milton hit.

The home was struck by a falling tree, the Tampa Police Department said.

15 people were rescued from the house, it added.

Follow live coverage of Hurricane Milton here.
